column2: was a Kenyan Roman Catholic prelate who served as Bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Homa Bay. He was appointed as bishop of Homa Bay on 18 October 1993 and he resigned on 20 February 2002.

column3: in the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Kisumu
column4: in present-day Kisumu County. He was ordained a priest on 10 December 1980. He served as a priest of the Archdiocese of Kisumu

column1: Father Okwach was appointed Bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Homa Bay
column2: on 18 October 1993. He was the first Ordinary of the newly created diocese
column3: and was consecrated a bishop at Homa Bay on 31 December 1993 by Cardinal Jozef  Tomko
column4: Cardinal-Deacon of Gesù Buon Pastore alla Montagnola
column6: Titular Archbishop of Serra and Archbishop Zacchaeus Okoth
column7: Archbishop of Kisumu. Bishop Okwach resigned as Bishop of Homa Bay on 20 February 2002.

column1: Bishop Emeritus Okwach fell down at his residence in 2019 and injured his back. He never stood up or walked again
column2: since that fall. Three weeks before his death
in Kisumu on account of complications of his illness. He died
column4: on 12 September 2020. He was laid to rest at St Paul's Cathedral in Homa Bay
